About

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ text_font=”Prata||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”55px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”Work Sans||||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”67px” header_2_font=”Prata||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”34px” header_3_font=”Work Sans|200|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_3_font_size=”47px” background_color=”#25588b” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” max_width=”76%” min_height=”104px” custom_padding=”20px|30px|20px|30px|true|true” border_radii=”off|70px|20px|80px|20px” box_shadow_style=”preset2″ box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.63)” global_colors_info=”{}”]

RON KAPUSCINSKI

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”19px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Work Sans|700|||||||” header_2_font_size=”39px” header_3_font=”Work Sans|800||on|||||” header_3_font_size=”53px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Kapuscinski family settled in Whitby in the 1920’s, immigrating from Poland. My grandfather purchased land on Rossland Road, east of Cochrane Street and operated an apple orchard for decades. They also operated a store/restaurant on the east side of Baldwin, north of Robert Attersley Dr. The farm was sold, and the land developed in the 1980’s.

I grew up in east Whitby and attended Anderson High School. After completing a degree at Lakehead University in Thunder Bay, I joined the Durham Regional Police in 1995. For the police, I have worked in Whitby, Oshawa, Port Perry and Pickering, both uniform patrol and investigations. While in Whitby, I was fortunate to work with multiple community organizations including Rotary, Whitby Road Watch and the Brooklin Spring Fair Committee. I also worked regularly with Whitby staff and council on several projects and initiatives to keep residents informed of new crime trends and methods to combat them. Further, I spearheaded and assisted in the creation and implementation of new by-laws such as the Nuisance and Towing bylaws.

It was during this time that my unit discovered a new crime trend developing in Whitby – Human Trafficking. Young girls from our community were being exploited and forced into the sex trade. I then focussed on this full time and for several years ran multiple successful projects teams in an effort to stop this horrific crime. Those projects eventually lead to the creation of a full-time unit within the Durham Police.

I have spent the last several years in the Professional Standards Unit, investigating internal issues and public complaints, ensuring accountability and compliance with legislation and policy within the service.

With my wife, Kerry, we have raised three daughters in Brooklin. All are now adults, and we are immensely proud of their accomplishments. As they grew up, we were immersed in local youth sport. I coached soccer and hockey and was a proud executive member of the Whitby Girls Hockey Association. I was also a convenor with Whitby Soccer for many years.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Why I’m Running

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”18px” header_2_font=”Work Sans|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#ece128″ header_2_font_size=”39px” custom_padding=”28px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Having spent 27 years serving the residents of our Region with the Durham Regional Police Service, I know our communities strengths, challenges, and the opportunities that lay ahead. My experience has provided me with a unique and valuable perspective that I believe will benefit all residents of our community.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#1f2554″ background_enable_image=”off” background_blend=”screen” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”1301px” custom_padding=”19px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://ronkapuscinski.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/Ron-Kapuscinski-sm.png” title_text=”Ron-Kapuscinski-sm” disabled_on=”on|off|off” _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”86%” min_height=”500px” height=”594px” max_height=”768px” custom_margin=”|-11px||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#25588b” custom_padding=”50px|50px|50px|50px|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|50px|50px|50px|true|false” custom_padding_phone=”50px|25px|50px|25px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”18px” header_2_font=”Work Sans|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#1f2554″ header_2_font_size=”39px” background_color=”#ece128″ custom_padding=”28px|20px|20px|20px|false|true” header_2_font_size_tablet=”39px” header_2_font_size_phone=”28px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” border_radii=”off|48px|10px|64px|10px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Why I’m Running

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”18px” header_2_font=”Work Sans|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#ece128″ header_2_font_size=”39px” custom_padding=”28px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Having spent 27 years serving the residents of our Region with the Durham Regional Police Service, I know our communities strengths, challenges, and the opportunities that lay ahead. My experience has provided me with a unique and valuable perspective that I believe will benefit all residents of our community.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”20px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”1338px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#25588b” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ icon_color=”#ece128″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Work Sans|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ece129″ header_font_size=”35px” header_letter_spacing=”4px” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_font_size=”18px” body_line_height=”30px” custom_margin=”||11px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Community Safety” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Work Sans|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#1f2554″ header_font_size=”35px” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_font_size=”18px” body_line_height=”30px” background_color=”#ece128″ custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”29px||18px||false|false” header_font_size_tablet=”35px” header_font_size_phone=”28px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” border_radii=”off|70px|10px|70px|10px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Work Sans|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ece129″ header_font_size=”35px” header_letter_spacing=”4px” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_font_size=”18px” body_line_height=”30px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

As a 27-year member of the Durham Regional Police, the relationships I have built during that time will be extremely valuable as a Regional Councillor. I will work with the Police to bring new initiatives, projects and awareness to members of the Whitby community.

The safety of those using our roadways is a top priority for me. I will work to find solutions to control speed in residential areas and specifically in our school zones.  I will connect with established programs including Whitby Road Watch and work to develop initiatives designed from an analysis of statistical data.

We should feel safe while using our walkways, parks and greenspaces. I will look to support and build initiatives and programs that will increase the safety for those using our public spaces.

Residential break-ins, car thefts and thefts from vehicles continue to be an issue that is plaguing our community. These crimes are typically geographically concentrated and move around in our community. I will work to raise awareness of those current trends and support/assist initiatives that will combat these crimes.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#25588b” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ icon_color=”#ece128″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Work Sans|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ece129″ header_font_size=”35px” header_letter_spacing=”4px” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_font_size=”18px” body_line_height=”30px” custom_margin=”||12px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”BUILDING A STRONGER COMMUNITY” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Work Sans|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#1f2554″ header_font_size=”35px” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_font_size=”18px” body_line_height=”30px” background_color=”#ece128″ custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”29px||18px||false|false” header_font_size_tablet=”35px” header_font_size_phone=”28px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” border_radii=”off|70px|10px|70px|10px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Work Sans|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ece129″ header_font_size=”35px” header_letter_spacing=”4px” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_font_size=”18px” body_line_height=”30px” custom_margin=”||69px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our senior population has grown substantially, and I will work hard to ensure they have a voice with council. Our seniors should feel safe in our community, and I will support community programs and police initiatives to raise awareness of crimes targeting the elderly and methods to arm themselves from falling victim to these crimes.  

Our local businesses are the heart of our community. I will look for ways to continue to support their growth as well as attract and encourage new business to open in Whitby. I will ensure we have sustainable, long term economic growth with increased revenues, new small businesses and the ability to keep your taxes low.

As a parent that raised three children in Whitby, I recognize the importance of youth and sport in the community. I will continue to support our youth sports organizations and look for ways to support and encourage participation for those less fortunate. 

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”1338px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#25588b” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||divi||400″ icon_color=”#ece128″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Work Sans|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ece129″ header_font_size=”35px” header_letter_spacing=”4px” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_font_size=”18px” body_line_height=”30px” custom_margin=”||3px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”PROTECTING YOUR TAX DOLLARS” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Work Sans|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#1f2554″ header_font_size=”35px” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_font_size=”18px” body_line_height=”30px” background_color=”#ece128″ custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”29px||18px||false|false” header_font_size_tablet=”35px” header_font_size_phone=”28px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” border_radii=”off|70px|10px|70px|10px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Work Sans|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ece129″ header_font_size=”35px” header_letter_spacing=”4px” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_font_size=”18px” body_line_height=”30px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

I plan to review the budget of each department/unit. I will challenge questionable spending in an effort to ensure every penny of your tax dollars are being well spent.  

Whitby has become a very attractive location for commercial industry. I will continue to support commercial and industrial growth.

Our residential tax rate is very high. I will look to find ways to be more efficient with your money to protect our tax rates and avoid any unnecessary increases.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#25588b” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ icon_color=”#ece128″ _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Work Sans|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ece129″ header_font_size=”35px” header_letter_spacing=”4px” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_font_size=”18px” body_line_height=”30px” custom_margin=”||3px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”PROTECTING / ENHANCING THE ENVIRONMENT” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Work Sans|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#1f2554″ header_font_size=”35px” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_font_size=”18px” body_line_height=”30px” background_color=”#ece128″ custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”29px||18px||false|false” header_font_size_tablet=”35px” header_font_size_phone=”28px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” border_radii=”off|70px|10px|70px|10px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Work Sans|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ece129″ header_font_size=”35px” header_letter_spacing=”4px” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_font_size=”18px” body_line_height=”30px” custom_margin=”||78px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

I will work with developers to expand Whitby’s walking and cycling trail network. As new housing developments take shape throughout Whitby, I will be an advocate to make green space a priority and continue to expand on our trail network. 

I recognize our waterfront is an important and valuable natural resource. I will look to protect and conserve our waterfront, while finding the right balance for strategic development.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Email Subscribe” _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#676987″ custom_padding=”4px||0px|||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”4%” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row module_id=”stayintouch” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_width_px=”710px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_position=”top_left” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” max_width=”100px” module_alignment=”center” height=”5px” custom_margin=”||20px|” custom_padding=”||20px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Request Section Title” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Cairo|700|||||||” header_font_size=”36px” header_2_font=”Work Sans|800||on|||||” header_2_font_size=”46px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Get Campaign Updates

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”18px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” global_colors_info=”{}”]

excerpt.rendered: ELECT RONKAPUSCINSKI Whitby Regional CouncilELECT       RONKAPUSCINSKI Whitby Regional Council About RON KAPUSCINSKIThe Kapuscinski family settled in Whitby in the 1920’s, immigrating from Poland. My grandfather purchased land on Rossland Road, east of Cochrane Street and operated an apple orchard for decades. They also operated a store/restaurant on the east side of Baldwin, […]

meta._et_pb_old_content:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!
